statement.p: In 51.28 of the last 39 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{39}}={0.5128}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{39}. \displaystyle{P}={0.5128}\cdot{39}={19.9992}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 39-19.9992=19.0008 We round that as requested to 19.
